meanings.definition: People who share a common interest or goal.
meanings.sent1: At the book club meeting, the colessees discussed their favorite characters.
meanings.sent2: The colessees at the cooking class all enjoyed learning new recipes together.
meanings.sent3: The colessees at the gardening club had a blooming good time planting flowers.
meanings.sent4: The colessees in the hiking group trekked through the forest as a united team.
meanings.sent5: The colessees in the charity organization worked together to help those in need.

meanings.definition: To join together in a common purpose or activity.
meanings.sent1: The students colessees to clean up the schoolyard after class.
meanings.sent2: Neighbors colessees to organize a neighborhood watch program.
meanings.sent3: The family colessees to bake cookies for a bake sale fundraiser.
meanings.sent4: The team colessees to win the championship game.
meanings.sent5: Volunteers colessees to build a new playground for the community.
